p:
PV results of the oil blends stored at 65Â°C for 10 days showed that olive oil is more stable than sesame and flaxseed oils. Flaxseed oil had the lowest stability which has also been previously reported.
24 Oil blends had a significant differences in PV obtained using the Schaal test ( Figure 1). As the amount of flaxseed oil was increased in the oil blends the oxidation stability of the oil blends decreased.
